sentence: Meanwhile, Democrat Alex Lasry is up with a new digital ad, seen first by NBC (h/t Natasha Korecki), hitting Johnson on Russia (the campaign says it will have six figures behind it).
title: Questions on race stand out on Day 2 of Supreme Court confirmation hearings

sentence: In many ways, Barnes, Milwaukee Bucks executive Alex Lasry, Outagamie County Executive Tom Nelson and state Treasurer Sarah Godlewski are following the political path Baldwin blazed.
author: Bill Glauber
title: Democratic U.S. Senate contenders in Wisconsin focus on manufacturing
